November 30, 1978 In re Certified Question from United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit (Knox v Eli Lilly & Company). (Docket No. 62152.) Goodman, Eden, Millender & Bedrosian for plaintiff. Dickinson, Wright, McKean, Cudlip & Moon for defendant.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
